about_the_game:
Happy bird day – is a game about funny hopping birds searching for seeds and exploring the vast world. Grab your friend and go into a world of fun and joy. You'll have to make an effort to complete this unforgettable adventure.

The game is so easy to pick up that anyone can join in the fun, but to complete the levels, you'll need to work hard. People say that those who fully complete the game become true masters of bird control. What about you, are you ready to become one of them?

Co-op

The game is based on two-player co-op. Here, you will need to work together to help two birds reach their desired goal. But what exactly will you have to face?

Beat levels, race against the clock, collect seeds, overcome obstacles: jump over pits, dodge thorns and don't trust absolutely every single animal that comes on your way (｡•ᴗ-)｡

Solo Mode

Can't find a friend? Don't worry, just play on your own. Here, you can test your abilities, improve your bird control skills and choose the best level completion tactics.

ㅤㅤ

Hurry up. The birds are eager to set off on their journey. They're waiting for you!

The game is so easy to pick up that anyone can join in the fun, but to complete the levels, you'll need to work hard. People say that those who fully complete the game become true masters of bird control. What about you, are you ready to become one of them?

Beat levels, race against the clock, collect seeds, overcome obstacles: jump over pits, dodge thorns and don't trust absolutely every single animal that comes on your way (｡•ᴗ-)｡

name: Happy Bird Day Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Quickly call your friend to play Happy Bird Day. Complete together levels full of surprises and fun physics. Overcome space and time, have fun and enjoy. P.S. Don't forget to find the seeds and carry them all the way to the end. In the demo can only play 20 people at the same time.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Ukrainian, Finnish, Japanese
